data.content:
Danh từhư counsellor
như counsellor

noun
US or chiefly Brit counsellor pl US -selors or chiefly Brit -sellors
[count] a person who provides advice as a job :a person who counsels people
a marriage counselor
a school guidance counselor [=a person who gives students advice about school, college, etc.]
US :a person who is in charge of young people at a summer camp
He works as a camp counselor.
US :lawyer
a counselor at law - often used as a form of address
I'd like to speak with you, Counselor. Do not confuse counselor with councillor.
